name: perfect-profile
description: A client information checking and updating single-page application for health clinics

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:client:fix && npm run lint:server:fix

author: Rene Malingre
